flawed_nl_solution:
Randy has 30-10=<<30-10=20>>20 dollars left after buying lunch.
Randy spent 20/4=<<20/4=5.0>>5.0 dollars on the ice cream cone.
Randy has 20-5.0=<<20-5.0=51.0>>51.0 dollars left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
